title: Water Magician - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Assassins   Dragons   Elves   Golems   Hard-Working Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Overpowered Protagonist   Politics   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Slow Romance   Spirits   Survival   Sword And Magic   Time Skip   Transported to Another World   Vampires   Weak to Strong
author: Kubou Tadashi   久宝忠
description:
This is the story of Ryo, who was reincarnated in the world of swords and magic.

It is a story of the royal road to survive using the magic of water attribute.

What is magic? What is swordsmanship?

How does it relate to the laws of physics that we know?

Or what is politics? What is a nation?

Why are there many 『kingdoms』 in reincarnation stories? Will republics not work?

Can it be written …?

Since it is a water-based magician, so it shall start with 『Hydrogen bond』!>
